changelog.change: Added Harry Potter 1 map whitelist.
New settings with the ability to split on either entering or leaving a map.
Added missing Harry Potter 2 and Harry Potter 3 maps
Harry Potter 2: Fixed adv3dungeonquest map name.
Added a setting to split on maps only once (enabled by default)
Added Harry Potter 2 map whitelist
Added Harry Potter 3 map whitelist
Added Splinter Cell maps
Added support for Star Trek: Deep Space Nine: The Fallen
Added support for Star Trek: Klingon Honor Guard
Removed Deus Ex autosplitter (now a separate project).
Added support for Mobile Forces.
Added support for X-COM: Enforcer.
Added saving time removal as a part of Deus Ex Load Remover.
Added support for Deus Ex.
Added support for another Harry Potter 2 version.
Return To Na Pali: Added the last map which was missing
Added Splinter Cell 1 and 3 support.
Internal changes have been made to support more games in the future, please report any issue on any game after this update.

Unreal Gold: CRITICAL BUG FIX: Auto-resets were preceded by an auto-split. Your golds are probably messed up if you had autosplitting enabled (sorry!). Return to Na Pali and the other games are not affected.
Unreal Gold: Fixed SpireVillage split.
Added Unreal Gold support.
Added HP3 support (load removal only).
Added basic support for Harry Potter 1 (map loads and saves only).
Activating autosplitting when the map whitelist is empty will now autosplit for any map.
